p: This group has also incorporated quaternized phosphonium salts into starch [ 144]. In this work, the derivatives were tested against the common plant-threatening fungi Watermelon fusarium, Phomopsis asparagi, Colletotrichum lagenarium, and Fusarium oxysporum. The most active derivatives were those with phenyl and cyclohexyl groups. The cytotoxicity of starch derivatives was also examined against HEK-293T cells using an MTT assay. These systems presented low cytotoxicity. The cytotoxicity was higher in those systems having alkyl groups.
